text: 8.15: 1 Ko 2.12; 4.6; 2 T 1.7; Hi 2.158.15: Ga 4.5-7Nde Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar ndigim, ana fhura nde ganɨrim, rɨrɨp wom nde ganɨrim, nde fhura anan ŋaara gumgir khɨni kegɨrga fhu. Zakɨra fhuvara! Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar nde muuŋgim, nde Fhe Bakɨme tari ma. Nza Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaara ŋkasŋkar panan, nza kha kakaman Fhe Bakɨme mbui, “Aba.” Kha zɨ “Aba,” anan nɨɨeŋ khare, “Dara.”
